ui.panel.page-onboarding.intro: Готови ли сте да събудите дома си, да отвоювате независимостта си и да се присъедините към световна общност от хора автоматизиращи домовете си?
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.intro: Нека да започнете, като създадете потребителски акаунт.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.user.data.name: Име
ui.panel.page-onboarding.core-config.int: Hello {name}, welcome to ioBroker. How would you like to name your home?
We would like to know where you live. This information will help with displaying information and setting up sun-based automations. This data is never shared outside of your network.
We can help you fill in this information by making a one-time request to an external service.
ui.panel.page-onboarding.integration.int: Devices and services are represented in ioBroker as integrations. You can set them up now, or do it later from the configuration screen.
